definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious
blackboard bulletin with short news items written on it (can usually be found in factories, schools etc)

sentences.english: The professor is leaning against the blackboard.
She loves to draw on the chalkboard paint wall (Hudson Paint).
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡在黑板牆上作畫。

sentences.english: I want to write on the blackboard, so I have to wipe all the words here out.
sentences.chinese: 我想在黑板上寫字，所以我必須把上面的單詞都擦去。

sentences.english: The chalk rasped across the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 粉筆劃過黑板發出刺耳的聲音。

sentences.english: And then on the board we did k1 much greater than k2.
sentences.chinese: 然後在黑板上我們做了k1比k2大得多的例子。

sentences.english: He draws this schema exactly as I have represented it for you on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他畫出這個基型，如同我在黑板上所繪製的。

sentences.english: He is standing in front of the blackboard, his back towards us.
sentences.chinese: 他站在黑板面前，背對着我們。

sentences.english: A few months later, he worked hard on a small blackboard chalk, and finally succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月後，他用一塊小黑板苦練粉筆字，終於成功。

sentences.english: He wiped the scribbling off the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他把黑板上亂塗亂劃的東西擦掉了。

sentences.english: The teacher asked who had thrown the eraser,but the class clammed up.
sentences.chinese: 老師問是誰扔的黑板擦，但全班學生保持沉默。

sentences.english: Wipe off these scribblings from the blackboard.
He saw a blackboard.The names of all the guests were written on the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 他看見一塊黑板，上面寫著所有住宿客人的名字。

sentences.english: In front of the blackboard is the teacher's desk.
sentences.chinese: 黑板前面是老師的講桌。

sentences.english: Blackboards surrender to the Black Forest.
sentences.chinese: 黑板不見了，取而代之的是蔥鬱的黑森林。

sentences.english: The picture is hanging over the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 那張圖掛在黑板的正上方。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith rapped on the board with his pointer to call the class to order.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生用教鞭敲着黑板要求全班安靜。

definition: to write on the blackboard/writing on the blackboard
to go to class/to attend class/to go to teach a class
book/notebook/Japanese-style self-published comic (esp. an erotic one), aka "dōjinshi"/CL:本[ben3]/edition
